Create.EmailNote: 其他用户不会看到您的电子邮件地址。请确保您输入的地址是有效的。忘记密码时需要通过该邮件地址找回。要添加用户头像，您需要将您的电子邮件地址与Gravatar绑定。电子邮件地址可以在日后更换。
Create.EmailTaken: This email address is already in use. If it's your address, please use the reset password function instead, or if that doesn't work, contact support.
Create.TwitterNote: Alternatively, you may sign in using your Twitter account. A Twitter account can also be connected afterwards.
Create.UsernameNote: 用户名必须至少3个字符，只能包含英文字母、数字和下划线。密码必须至少{{0}}个字符。

Details.ConfirmDisable: Are you sure you want to disable this user?
Details.PossibleProducerMessage:
Are you possibly an artist (such as producer, animator or illustrator) working with Vocaloid/UTAU?
If so, please see the {{0}}.
Details.VisibleOnlyToMe: Visible only to me and staff.

Login.LoginWithoutSSL: 不使用SSL登录(较为不安全)

MySettings.AccessKeyDescription:
Access key can be used to log in to your VocaDB account from various other services without revealing your actual password.
				You can regenerate your access key at any time - this will invalidate the previous access key.
				Keep your access key secret! If you suspect your access key has been discovered by someone else, please reset it immediately.
MySettings.AnonymousActivity: Allow my username to be shown in the recent activity list.
MySettings.ChangePasswordNotice: You only need to fill these if you want to change your password.
MySettings.EmailNote: (not shown to other users, used by gravatar and password resets)
MySettings.EmailTaken: This email address already belongs to another user. If it is your address, contact support.
MySettings.InvalidEmail: Please check the format of the email address.
MySettings.PublicAlbumCollection: Allow others to see which albums I own.
MySettings.PublicRatings: Allow everyone to see my song and album ratings.
MySettings.UnableToSave: Unable to save settings. Please correct the errors and try again.

RequestVerification.ArtistTitle: 您申请核实的条目名称：（必填）
RequestVerification.NoPrivateMessage: 下方所填地址即证明材料
RequestVerification.NotLoggedInMessage: 您只有【{{0}}】或【{{1}}】之后才能进行此操作。
RequestVerification.PrivateMessage: 证明材料将通过私信提交至管理员
RequestVerification.URL: 证明材料地址，如一条说明“VocaDb某目是我本人”的微博：（必填）
